website_summaries.verdict: A safe and sophisticated looking covered double chaise lounge designed just for kids.
pros: The grown ups at the pool party may be a bit jealous that its just the kids who can enjoy this stylish chaise lounge built for 2
Made of solid wood and can be assembled within an hour
We also love the built-in cup holders that nicely blend in with the overall design

customer_reviews.title: Puppy cabana bed!
customer_reviews.text: We don’t have children, bought this for my dogs so they could enjoy summer pool days with us. They love it and use all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, Good idea, but cheap product.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for our daughters. I thought it would be so cute for them to lounge in their own chair. It was a pain to put together. Some of the wood pieces spilt while screwing them together. Thank goodness my husband is really good with wood and building. He was able to work some magic. My girls love it, however, my 5.5yo is almost too big for it 😔. She is 48", 60lbs. My 7yo fits perfectly. She's 46", 42lbs.
customer_reviews.author: mikemoto81

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Bother Purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would have skipped this product! The wood is super cheap, especially compared to the price point paid at the time (almost $130). The wood was cracked in two places and discolored in others (the wood also smelled terrible, like wet soil). I also wished I’d read the reviews instead of just looking at the star rating because lots of people called out how small this is. My youngest is five and doesn’t fit on this. It’s made for 1-3 (4 at the most if you have smaller than average children). My recommendation is to not bother purchasing as it’s a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing ever. It is worth the price. It’s sturdy and the cushions wipe clean easily, which is important with furniture made for little ones. I have 2 grand babies that are about a year and a half and they can sit on it easily and there’s enough room to nap on the flat part. The cup holders are perfect for supply cups or juice boxes and the table top lifts to place items inside. The sun shades can be tied back as well. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: Wood splitting on a new product-really soft, poor quality of wood use. Awful having a kids product where the wood is going to give my kid splinters. We had to drill new holes in a section that didn’t line up properly. The pieces were uneven and the final product isn’t level. The seat cushions are a little squished from side to side to get it to fit. One cushions Velcro straps on the back is actually too big so the cushion is moving, the other cushion Velcro strap fit perfectly. Really awful quality of a product and I will NOT recommend this to anyone. (Having issues uploading more photos:sorry)
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller then pictures. Description for age group is false.
customer_reviews.text: Even the pictures I took, it looks bigger. No kid older then 3 (maybe 4 if very small) is going to fit in this comfortably. Disappointed in the size but my fault for not measuring. It’s very cute. Has a strong odor & the silica package was ripped so tiny gold beads fell all over the yard when I opened the box. It’s lightweight enough to move with one hand but sturdy enough to not blow away in heavy wind & not tip when kids are playing. Can’t really recommend unless it was a foot longer at least. There’s no finish on it so can splinter & the cup holder edges can definitely scrape the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two Italian Greyhounds, they love to swelter in the Arizona sun. This took me about 5 or 6 hours to assemble but that's because it has lots of structural pieces. The wood itself is a strong, hardwood not cheap pine. The pre-drilled holes match up almost perfectly which led to frustration free assembly. A tip is to use wood glue when screwing pieces together, I've done this in the past with wooden furniture like this and the end result is much better, no twisting or distorting and the thing holds up very well outdoors for years when you do this.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh W. Gleaves

customer_reviews.title: For Smaller Kids
customer_reviews.text: I put this together by myself. All the pieces and hardware were there. It took my over an hour, close to two, to put it together. I finally gave up on the handheld screwdriver and used a power drill. It’s definitely for smaller children. My daughter and granddaughter are both 6, however my daughter is about 6 inches taller. Her feet hang off. The only issues I had with this piece were: 1) piece 20 was to short to fit in-between 18-19. I think those were the pieces 2) wish the snaps would have come installed. Overall this will make the girls happy and have their own place to relax after swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Fontana611

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going to buy kidkraft, you should automatically expect to spend some time assembling quite a few pieces of wood. However, the instructions are pretty clear, as long as you pay attention to the detail and orientation in the pictures. The final product is sturdy and super cute. I do not know how long it will last outside in the AZ heat. We’ll see
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Even after carefully reading the dimensions it seems much smaller than I expected. It wasn't that hard to assemble but it's also not made from the strongest wood either. I splintered a couple of pieces just by screwing down to tightly. It's really cute and everyone has asked where I got it but probably not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mynda

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Such a great item, and my husband said it's very sturdy! It took him close to 2 hours on / off assembly. Only downside the wood is not waterproof and we'd have to seal it... which is silly because it's a pool cabana, it's an outdoor item therefore should be protected properly.. Other than that it's adorable!!
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Wood is flimsy, wood screws provided didn’t really do anything to hold it all together half the time, had to use my own. Cushions started fading after less than 3 weeks and some elements started rusting few DAYS after putting it together. It looks cute, but I don’t think it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: wilfredo pantoja

customer_reviews.title: Smell was strong and gave headache- will update later
customer_reviews.text: I have not put this together yet so I will update this review later but once I opened the package I immediately had to place it outside because the smell was so strong. It smelt like a chemical I have no idea but I couldn’t breathe it in for long it gave me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but unsure if it is sturdy for children over the age of 7
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute. However, the wood feels as though it may not last long. Almost lightweight and brittle like balsa. I’m excited to put it outside, but our children’s friends are frequently over. I’m nervous that if a young kid happens to step on it or sits down too hard, for whatever reason, it may not hold. If it holds up over the summer, I’ll set a reminder to update this review. My 6 year old is 34 lbs, and is very lively and energetic (likes to climb on furniture amongst other things). Worried this may not last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Lots of assembly, but nice!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sturdy kid lounger! It is a little smaller than I had hoped but my 4 year old still loves it. Be prepared for the assembly though. It comes completely apart. You will have to put every song piece together right down to screwing in the snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Megan G

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my grandchildren They are well made and so fun for children 6 and under. Had an issue with one of the curtains, the company responded immediately and fixed the situation. I have purchased other KidKraft products and have always been impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Yingling

customer_reviews.title: Beware ! Cute however!
customer_reviews.text: Beware ! Super cute z however pictures portrays it as bigger for kids , this is for 1-3 toddler top . My daughter and son is 5, it won’t last then a couple months with they way they grow. Plus missed 2 parts and screw and had to rig it to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie H.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was pretty easy, took a little less than an hr ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this item! Her and the dog go and sit on it every time we go swimming. We sprayed it with scotch guard and that has saved us some headaches in regards to spills. Assembly was pretty easy, took a little less than an hr to put together. Becareful of using power tools as the wood will crack.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this little set, super cute. Only downside is the fabric is easily damaged by sun and rain so it is discolored and stained after only a few months. Will most likely have them recovered. It is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Adore this
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, we constantly get compliments on it from adults-it looks so grown-up! The kids love it too though, it's a comfy place to get a little relief from the sun in style for our kids. Durable, not hard to put together and so stylish. It's a steal I recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5 year old granddaughters. Very cute but a little too short for them. Their legs hang over the chair when they are stretched out. Wish back of chair could be adjusted. They love it and they love how they feel like big girls
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bee

customer_reviews.title: As I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! Super cute. Thick cushions too. I knocked off a star because when screwing on the canopy snaps you have to eyeball or measure where to place them. It's not complicated to do so I'm just a little anal that way.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Burke

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The wood was in very good condition. No cracks or splinters. Assemble was easy, it took about forty-five minutes. Its beautiful, my grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Hilo Girl

customer_reviews.title: Kids....dont think so.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say it's for kids. Barely fits a toddler
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Assembly and age limit
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable and pretty easy to put together. The down fall is the snaps do not have pre-drilled holes so measuring out where these go is challenging. Also, my daughter is three, average height and her head touches the roof, so I wouldn’t recommend it for kids older than 3.
customer_reviews.author: byron maine

customer_reviews.title: Great little chair
customer_reviews.text: Great little chair. It's pretty small. I would say only kids up to age 5 could use it. All the parts were included, nothing was missing. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the instructions are not very good but I would recommend if you have patience to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Ah these are THE CUTEST. Love this product. Took about an hour for me to assemble but I also did it by myself. Easy instructions and great product. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, I like to build things
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, I like to build things, you should use a screw gun to put it together it will save you a lot of time. its a great product. I saw it near my home on someones front yard and asked about where he purchased it. I went home and I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My two daughters absolutely love this! Easy to assemble (but yes
customer_reviews.text: My two daughters absolutely love this! Easy to assemble (but yes, there are lots of parts) and instructions are easy to follow. Took about 45 minutes to put together. Very sturdy and well made. Daughters are 3 and 1, perfect size for both of them and will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put together. My only complaint would be that they need to provide more snaps. As I was tightening the screws on a few of them, the center popped out. Most were fine, but ended up not putting snaps for the inner curtains to attach to. It's absolutely adorable and the perfect size for my daughter and niece. We've bought a couple other Kid Kraft items and have been very happy overall with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. so cute really
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. so cute really, but the wooden corners are sharp and we had a crying 2 year old the first time she climbed onto the lounge. The wood is stained but it not finished really so every corner is a potential boo boo.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Love This!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our two youngest granddaughters to use when they come to our home, it is adorable! Really well-built with accurate instructions for assembly. We have taken so many photos with them lounging in it with sunglasses on and tippy cups in hand!
customer_reviews.author: James Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: Patience needed when assembling
customer_reviews.text: You literally have to assemble every single piece. I still have to screw in the snaps. Glad I had an afternoon to do it. The things you do for grandkids! One cushion has a tear. I am hoping this gets resolved. It will be nice once it's completed. For $100, I'd rather buy something already put together.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and provides shade
customer_reviews.text: I wish the seats reclined but it’s perfect for the yard. My 4 year old “just fits” in it. It’s perfect for toddlers. Ages 18 months -4
customer_reviews.author: ErikaNorthEast

customer_reviews.title: Big hit. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Big hit. I have a 3 year old and a 2 year old. It fits them very well. beautiful piece. High quality. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Darcey

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute...mine came damaged and was missing alot of the screw holes.. you will def.need a drill to put together to drill all the holes they missed.. it comes in a million pieces. But it's pretty cute once done
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Get it on sale!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Perfect for ages 1-3, not suitable for taller/older kids.
customer_reviews.author: thishappymess

customer_reviews.title: Product fades and nails rust
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful it’s made very well until a few months ago by all of the pillows faded and all of the nails that put it together are all rusting this is not very safe for children if I could return it at this point I would
customer_reviews.author: frannee

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: Compared several similar products before purchasing this for my niece for her birthday. I am very happy with my choice and so is she!!! Assembly took my brother in law a few hours of cursing me but he said it wasn't too bad at all. The chair is very sturdy and the kids find it very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Nick Brozek

customer_reviews.title: Defective parts.
customer_reviews.text: I was totally looking forward to receiving this product. It was such a let down to discover a couple of the parts were defective. Specifically, part #20 was cracked/damaged and one of the cushions was snagged. Not sure if it happened due the damaged wood piece during shipping possibly rubbing together during shipping. Need to return. Although it is super cute for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This cabana is a great value. It's durable and very sturdy. The granddaughter loves it. She's 16 months and can easily get on and off it. She can easily use this till she's about 5 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: EDIA

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this!!!!!! 2&3 year old grandchildren fit great but it probably won’t fit them for more than 2 more years. Wish I had seen this a couple years ago! The workmanship isn’t too bad but it took about 3 hours even with 2 people putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Fairbrother

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. No missing parts. Took me about 2 hrs to assemble. The wood doesn’t look water proof and is rough on the touch. Is good for very little kids like 2-4 yrs old. It is too small for our 5 year old daughter. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Angie JM

customer_reviews.title: great for 6 and under
customer_reviews.text: Husband put this together in an hour, my kids love it. Up to around 6 year olds fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: No, YOUR child is spoiled..
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes a while to put together but is definitely strong and will hold up to 180 lbs. It will hold kids or dogs just fine. Suuuuper cute!
customer_reviews.author: artgal

customer_reviews.title: A little small—but nice
customer_reviews.text: This was quite time consuming to put together. The age range it says it will fit is quite a stretch. My granddaughter is a tiny 6 year old. (42 lbs and not even 4ft tall) and she can sit in this but it’s not quite as much legs room as we anticipated with the age range they gave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Furious!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!!! The screws do not match up! My husband and I have spent hours trying to get the same screws in the same Holes that DO NOT FIT!!!!! I want a refund ASAP!!!!! Furious!
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH

customer_reviews.title: No DIRECTIONS
customer_reviews.text: Came with no directions, a year later, still can't put it TOGETHER or figure out how to get directions from company. Otherwise would of gave it a better review
customer_reviews.author: Cherri LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Slightly intoxicated senior citizen has Spinal Tap experience with chaise lounge
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks ago my wife and I were sipping cocktails in the sun while browsing Amazon on my iPad. I spotted this nice looking chaise longe. You can guess what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Harley A. Feinstein

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and the kids love it, however, the stain job on the pieces in my box were terrible. Drip marks, uneven, even entire streaks with no stain! My teen spent about 2 hours putting it together though, so at that point it was too late to take apart and return.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Maack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandtwins love it!!! It is good to see them relaxing in their own adult-like lounge chair.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small!
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Small and a pain to assemble! It's for kids under 5 I would say. It's a lot smaller than it looks. It's adorable once you finally get it together. Took around 2 hours (1 person). If you get this under $100 buy it, it will last s year or two and the kids do enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Small; Best for much younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Adorable dual lounge and great for the price. But I definitely think the age range is a little off. It says 3-8, so I assume it would be rather big for an 3 year old but my average sized 5 year olds’ feet hang off of it. We may buy an ottoman of sorts to extend the life.
customer_reviews.author: Milos Kivich

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, clear assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4-year-old granddaughter and she loves it! Great quality, clear assembly instructions. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: lace42

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super cute !!! pay attention to measurements as its small for like 1,2 and 3 year old kids
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and the quality is great. The instructions are very easy, but it does take some time to put together. I think it’s a great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing product my little ones, they enjoy their new acquisition every sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Yaned K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was such a nice addition to our poolside. Kiddos let be it.
customer_reviews.author: Tishyliz

customer_reviews.title: Description should say fits children 3-5
customer_reviews.text: On the description of this item it says that it is for ages 3-8. There is no way a 7 or 8 year year old could fit in this. My 6 year old granddaughter that I bought it for barely fits in it, so that was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: stacey mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Small for my 6 year old. But he still gets in and fits. Sturdy. Would suggest scotch guarding to keep nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Monjaraz

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, definitely worth the money, but keep in mind it's a toddler size ,maybe up to 5 though appears larger on pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia V Kyriakoulis

customer_reviews.title: ... to assemble but its worth the time it looks great and for the price my grand daughters love it
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of work to assemble but its worth the time it looks great and for the price my grand daughters love it!
customer_reviews.author: chuck hernandez

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN MINUTES
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. bought his for my 3 year old nieces bday gift... she sat in it by the pool the day of her party and the wood on the leg literally split it half after 5 minutes. we couldn't use it and she had no chair to sit in the rest of the day. VERY DISAPPOINTED ! I'd like to inquire about a refund but can't find an email address to contact anyone
customer_reviews.author: gloria constantino

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great completion to our pool area
customer_reviews.text: Excellent after drilling a few holes that didn't aligned perfectly as expected! My grands love it & it completed the look around the pool in our backyard we were looking for! Thx again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this so much!!! It's made well!!! My kids love it and it looks great in our backyard
customer_reviews.author: Janice J. Englebrecht

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got it put together! Seems sturdy, great quality and it is adorable! Great buy...highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Beautful
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Everyone that sees it wants one for their children.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Digiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really small in person- my grandson is 2 and it will really only fit him this summer
customer_reviews.author: Tami Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Would not do again if I had the option.
customer_reviews.text: Tough to put together. Smaller than anticipated. Over priced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Beery

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Overall great but was thinking it was going to be a lot bigger. Perfect for ages 2-4 but would not recommend for kids over 4. My 5 year old barley fits in it
customer_reviews.author: Anthony John Valazza

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality wasn't there at all for the money. Big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Weyandt

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. A little challenging to put together and smaller than I was expecting but my grandsons are loving it by their pool!
customer_reviews.author: Becki Mcmeen

customer_reviews.title: So cute for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and my grandkids love it! Put up at pool deck so the littles will have their own lounger.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: Product is sturdy. Lots of boards and screws to assemble. Took about 1.5 hours all together. Size is perfect. Cushions are not very dense. Grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lounge
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product for purchase. Parts to assemble doesn’t fit - drills are not aligned. It is very very small - not for Kids. More for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Heuser

customer_reviews.title: We love this Chaise Lounge
customer_reviews.text: We love this Chaise Lounge, it's surprisingly very sturdy. My husband weighs over 170lbs and he will sit in it with my daughter. Makes me nervous, because I put it together and it took me 2 hours. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie M

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters loved it but had way too many pieces to put together.
customer_reviews.author: carol cicchiani

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but only really worth $50.
customer_reviews.text: This was an impulse buy, I'll admit it. I had visions of my kid da laying out in the shade happily. It is nice, but a PAIN to assemble and in hindsight it should have only cost around $50. It's not worth more.
customer_reviews.author: H.Walter

customer_reviews.title: Girls love it
customer_reviews.text: My girls are so excited to have a lounge chair their size! There were many, many pieces but assembly wasn’t hard. They are about to turn 4, perfect size for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This piece is sturdy and so cute. I think the price is very reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: This item will not make it one year with the quality of this wood split wood chipped wood prior to install very unhappy design i
customer_reviews.text: parts are very cheap quality pieces of wood are chipped severly . This item will not make it one year with the quality of this wood split wood chipped wood prior to install very unhappy design is great but quality is awful
customer_reviews.author: amy hulett

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super great, very sturdy. Amazingly cute. Kids love it. It survived Florida’s hurricane season perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little on the small side.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Says for up to 8 yrs old, my nieces are 5 and basically have it maxed out. Still they love it and it was a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Marci K

customer_reviews.title: Great little lounger
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute little lounger for little ones! Made well and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: SanTan Deb

customer_reviews.title: Must have for outdoor use for kids
customer_reviews.text: Has alot of parts to put it together but other than that it is beautiful. My 17 month old granddaughter Luvs it
customer_reviews.author: Koty Mono

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my two granddaughters ages 3 and 1! They love that it is just the right size and has a place to put their drink cups.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great except that the buttons for the cover are rusted after a few months of use. Kid craft, doesn’t warranty longer than 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen T McCaffrey

customer_reviews.title: small but nice
customer_reviews.text: very cute for the little grandchildren.....maybe 4 and under? It would be nice if they offered a bigger one for older children.
customer_reviews.author: angela pardue

customer_reviews.title: Defective snap on canopy
customer_reviews.text: One of the snaps on the very front of the canopy was broke off of the fabric and snapped into the wood already. Way too many pieces and the wood doesn't seem very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Tara LaBerge

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids own space
customer_reviews.text: Too many parts to put together! But once it was finished the grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely precious but did take a LONG TIME to put together
customer_reviews.author: Hittman

customer_reviews.title: This is the cuties the only issues I had was ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the cute the only issues I had was with one of the cushions the sewing was wrong on the Velcro straps. The other was the canopy was missing a button
customer_reviews.author: sarah christian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pieces to assemble it great quality and the kids love it !
customer_reviews.author: Kbrown44

customer_reviews.title: Priduct is very cute but came full of Thermites! ...
customer_reviews.text: Priduct is very cute but came full of Thermites!!! Very disapointing that a childs product comes with thermites and not carfully insoected
customer_reviews.author: Elena Kassner

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Came within days, great set. It's not warm enough to use daily yet but it was easy to put together and looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H.

customer_reviews.title: Should be called Chaise Lounge "Kit"
customer_reviews.text: Good quality parts, but it should be called Chaise Lounge "KIT" because it comes with a ton of unassembled parts. Even the braces across the bottom have to be assembled. Haven't put it together yet, because I'm sure It is going to take a while to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D.

customer_reviews.title: Could be a bit bigger but otherwise is great. Simple to put together except for the buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: Could be a bit bigger but otherwise is great. Simple to put together except for the buttons at the end, they could have made pilot holes for them like everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Flaim

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Baby Cabana!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. Our little beach baby is turning 1 and this is a perfect highlight to his pool party celebrating his birthday. It's very well made, but did require quite a bit of assembly. Light enought to take in and out of house depending on the weather. Fabric is a great quality. Just wish they had other color options. He actually likes it enough to climb up in and sit in it himself. Everyone comments on how cool it is and I hope he enjoys it for a few years. Now we just need one for the grown ups.... :)
customer_reviews.author: Charlene M. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Cutest thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! My 2 yr old grandson loves it. My 20 year old son put it together pretty easy. I need one in red now.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Wagner

product_meta.title: KidKraft Double Chaise Lounge with Cup Holders, 36.5 x 33.4 x 35.1, Espresso, Model:
product_meta.description: When the weather gets warm, children love to "chill" Under the KidKraft double chaise lounge's three-sided canopy. There's room for two friends to kick back and relax. A pair of cupholders are perfect for cold drinks on warm days. The high-quality, weather-resistant construction will keep this cute lounger looking good through all the seasons.
feature_bullets: Included Components: Double Chaise Lounger With Cupholder
